sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; import '../components/dashboard.css'; import { FaUsers, FaBuilding, FaCalendarCheck, FaUserCheck, FaPlus, FaEye, FaCog, FaBell, FaClock, FaCheckCircle, FaExclamationTriangle, FaChartLine, FaUserPlus, FaCalendarAlt } from 'react-icons/fa'; const Dashboard = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(true); const [currentTime, setCurrentTime] = useState(new Date()); useEffect(() => { // Simulate loading time for better UX const timer = setTimeout(() => setIsLoading(false), 1500); // Update time every minute const timeInterval = setInterval(() => { setCurrentTime(new Date()); }, 60000); return () => { clearTimeout(timer); clearInterval(timeInterval); }; }, []); if (!user) { return (
); } const quickActions = [ { icon: , title: 'Add Employee', description: 'Register new team member', color: 'var(--gradient-primary)', action: () => console.log('Add Employee') }, { icon: , title: 'Mark Attendance', description: 'Record daily attendance', color: 'var(--gradient-secondary)', action: () => console.log('Mark Attendance') }, { icon: , title: 'View Reports', description: 'Check analytics & insights', color: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #ff6b6b, #ee5a24)', action: () => console.log('View Reports') }, { icon: , title: 'Settings', description: 'Configure preferences', color: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #a8edea, #fed6e3)', action: () => console.log('Settings') } ]; const recentActivities = [ { icon: , title: 'Attendance marked', description: 'John Doe checked in at 9:00 AM', time: '2 hours ago', type: 'success' }, { icon: , title: 'New employee added', description: 'Sarah Wilson joined Marketing department', time: '4 hours ago', type: 'info' }, { icon: , title: 'System maintenance', description: 'Scheduled maintenance completed successfully', time: '1 day ago', type: 'warning' } ]; return (
{/* Header Section */}

Welcome back, {user.name}! ðŸ‘‹

{currentTime.toLocaleDateString('en-US', { weekday: 'long', year: 'numeric', month: 'long', day: 'numeric' })}

{activity.time}
))}
{/* Role-based Content */} {user.role === 'Admin' && (

Manage all employees and their records
Create and manage departments
View and manage attendance reports

)} {user.role === 'Employee' && (

Employee Dashboard

View and update your personal information
Check your attendance records and history
View department updates and announcements
)}
); }; export default Dashboard;
